examples.message:
feat(auth): add JWT token refresh mechanism

Implements automatic token refresh 5 minutes before expiration
to maintain seamless user sessions without re-authentication.

Closes #142
examples.explanation: New authentication feature with clear description and issue reference

examples.message:
feat(api): add pagination support for user list endpoint

Adds limit and offset query parameters.
Includes total count in response headers.

Closes #234

fix(auth): resolve JWT validation error for expired tokens

The JWT validator was throwing unhandled errors when tokens expired.
Added proper error handling and user-friendly error messages.

Fixes #156
examples.explanation: Bug fix explaining the problem and solution

examples.message:
fix(api): prevent null pointer exception in user lookup

Added null check before accessing user properties.
Returns 404 instead of 500 when user not found.

Fixes #189
examples.explanation: Bug fix with error handling improvement

refactor.description: Code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

examples.message:
refactor(auth): extract JWT utilities into separate module

Moves token generation, validation, and refresh logic to
auth/jwt-utils.ts for better organization and reusability.

No functional changes.

refactor(api): simplify error handling with middleware

Replaces try-catch blocks in each route with centralized
error handling middleware.

Reduces code duplication by ~200 LOC.

test(auth): add JWT refresh token tests

Adds tests for:
- Token refresh before expiration
- Expired token handling
- Invalid refresh token scenarios

Increases auth coverage to 95%.

test(api): add integration tests for user endpoints

Tests full request/response cycle including:
- User creation
- User retrieval
- User updates
- Error cases

chore.description: Changes to build process or auxiliary tools

examples.message:
chore(deps): update dependencies to latest versions

Updates:
- express: 4.17.1 -> 4.18.2
- jsonwebtoken: 8.5.1 -> 9.0.0

All tests passing after update.

chore(ci): add automated security scanning

Adds npm audit check to CI pipeline.
Fails build if high/critical vulnerabilities found.

perf.description: A code change that improves performance

examples.message:
perf(api): add caching for user lookup queries

Implements Redis caching with 5-minute TTL.
Reduces database queries by ~80%.
Improves response time from 150ms to 20ms.

perf(auth): optimize JWT verification

Caches public key for signature validation.
Reduces token verification time by 60%.
